author: {'steamid': '76561197995498126', 'num_games_owned': 2373, 'num_reviews': 668, 'playtime_forever': 735, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 735, 'last_played': 1559309872}
review:
Cooles game!

Quasi wortwörtlich. ^^
Im Prinzip ist es eine 1:1 Umsetzung von Teil 1.
Der einzige Unterschied neben den warm angezogenen Bugs ist der entschärfte 100% savegame.
Ich weiß noch, das sich mich vorher so gequält hatte, udn nur mit Videoanleitung die Missionen auf Hart geschafft habe.
Nun reicht es, alles auf Leicht durchzuspielen.
Das erfordert übrigens schon oft genug die ganze Aufmerksamkeit.
Denn vor allem die eingestreuten Missionen wie bei Plants vs. Zombies mit herabsinkenden Turmkarten zum Bauen, müssen meist passend irgendwo hingesetzt werden, wenn man wirklich 3 Sterne Wertungen erzielen möchte.
Aber selbst diese Missionen sollte man nach 3 oder 4 Versuchen dann meist geschafft haben.
Alles in allem ein netter Zeitvertreib und spaßig genug.
Tower Defense Freunde können und sollten es ruhig durchspielen, auch wenn man die normale Version schon hatte.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003818180', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1599, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1549223251}
review:
This is the Christmas version of the Garden Rescue tower defence/ strategy game. The game developers haven’t reinvented the wheel with this game, just put a festive spin on the game with a few tweaks here and there to make things interesting. I especially love the coin collecting system that they have implemented - great improvement.
The graphics are bright and cheery, music fitting the seasonal theme and the festive costumes the bugs/attackers wear are fun.

For those that are new to the Garden Rescue game or new to tower defence/strategy games in general this is a good game to start as there is a good tutorial guide. Loads of achievements to collect and upgrades and prizes too. If you are in the mood for a bit of holiday fun then give this game a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137248204', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 23797, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14378, 'last_played': 1703381075}
review: I love this game! Have the Garden Rescue as well. Have almost 300 hrs on this one. Shoot bugs out of the air with corn shooters, burn bugs with the flaming bell peppers and tons of other ingenious methods, all in order to protect your Christmas trees! Easy and hard levels. It's cute and crazy for kids and adults. Good music too. Really hope that they develop another version. Highly recommend for casual gaming.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118005728', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 566, 'playtime_forever': 417, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 417, 'last_played': 1476426252}
review: Garden Rescue: Christmas Edition is basically a reskin of Garden Rescue. It's not a bad thing though. It is a very fun and colorful tower defense game. The various plant 'defenders' include a pea shooter(ground enemy only), corn shooter(air enemy only), and my favorite the spinning cactus(both ground and air enemies) plus many others. They all have 3 available upgrades. The Christmas trees that you are protecting also have 3 upgrades increasing the amount of money they spew out. There are boss fights and they can stun your defenders by stomping. Land mines, spring boards and lawn mowers are some of the special drops after defeating a wave of enemies. It's a fun casual TD game, buy it if you're a fan of the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198256291224', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 688, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 688, 'last_played': 1530195499}
review:
Same as the non-Christmas version: Very enjoyable game that clearly takes inspiration from Plants vs. Zombies, but it's a proper tower defense (not lane defense). It looks a bit like a mobile port, but it doesn't have any of the annoying aspects that often come from this. No grind for currency to buy upgrades or such; towers and upgrades are unlocked just by playing.

Pro:
There's a good tower selection with different abilities (slow, air attack, multiple targets, DoT...) and consumables that drop from enemies that can be placed on the path, all of which stays relevant throughout the levels. 
3 settings - easy, normal, hard - and 2 game modes, though they can't be selected. Most maps are regular "buy towers as you see fit", a few are "use random towers given to you".
Encyclopedia with enemy, tower and consumable documentation.
Fun, colorful look and non-annoying music.
Trading cards and reasonable achievements.
No map recycles.
Christmas version adds more consumables/path traps (ice mines, blizzard, snowballs)

Con:
Somewhat short, I wish there were more levels or maybe mini games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198300270231', 'num_games_owned': 5388, 'num_reviews': 894, 'playtime_forever': 3052, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1973, 'last_played': 1520064160}
review:
아이템 추가 및 디자인 테마만 빼면 전작과 다를 게 없는 [b]《정원을 지켜라: 크리스마스 에디션》[/b]이다. 그냥 전작과 마찬가지로 무난한 타워 디펜스다. 앞서 말했듯 차이점이 거의 없다시피 하기에, 개인적으로는 훨씬 지루했다. 영상 가이드가 없었다면 질질 늘어지는 게임에 현기증을 느꼈을 지도 모르겠다. 

 + 무난한 타워 디펜스
 + 영상으로 된 가이드가 있음
 + 도전과제 올클리어가 쉬운 편에 속함
 + 트레이딩 카드 존재(플탐 대비 파밍시간 적절)

 - 배속 기능이 최대 2배 밖에 지원 안 됨
 - 전작을 플레이한 유저일 경우, 완전히 같은 게임을 반복하는 셈

타워 디펜스를 어느 정도 즐기는 유저에겐 나름 킬링타임 정도는 가능하다고 본다. 하지만 가성비는 아무리 봐도 창렬이기 때문에, 할인이 붙었을 경우 또는 번들로 구매하도록 하자. 일단 무난한 게임성에 지루함을 막아준 가이드의 존재로 인해 엄지를 올리기는 하겠다.

review: Есть карточки! Есть достижения. Игра нормальная. Убей врага пока он не добрался до хаты. Надо строить на пути лабиринт, чтобы его задержать подольше.Графика не особо крутая, мультяшная. Рекомендую для всех возрастов и семейного вечера. Надолго игра не затягивает но интересная. Занимает всего 160 MB. Оценка выше только из-за наличия достижений. А вообще имеются недостатки, карты плохо спланированы. Оценка:9 из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056588360', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1505208502}
review: Essentially the same game as Garden Rescue, this is a very simplistic tower defense game with some significant design flaws. Enemies carry the plants that you are protecting back to the beginning of the path, dropping them wherever they die. This means that if any enemies get past your towers, it becomes easier for all future enemies to get to your plants, and many of the towers you've built may become useless. Also, the towers will sometimes target the closest enemy, rather than the enemy farthest along the path, needlessly allowing enemies to get past them. There is no way to adjust the towers targeting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1496912391}
review:
Tags: Casual - Tower Defense
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Derivative tablet port shovelware

Review: Keeping it brief. This is a cheap 2D sprites with no animation tower defense game. Suffers from your usual tablet port problems like resolution problems. This is even more derivative in that it recycles engine from Garden rescue and just adds a tiny bit of snow texturing and shuffles the map layouts a bit and replaces strawberries for christmas trees. If you are desperate for content this is servicable even though it vaguely rips off the art style of PvZ for the enemies. However be advised that there is no fast forward button so you will be in for a little bit of a grueling wait at times. The whole thing is really paint by the numbers and I am removing it for declutter

author: {'steamid': '76561198347198217', 'num_games_owned': 559, 'num_reviews': 211, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1508605635}
review: [h1] Winter is hibernation time for insects, but not in our garden! It will be hot here again this winter, and beetles are launching a full-scale offensive against the Christmas trees – on Christmas Eve! All garden dwellers are ready for the defense, and it is up to you to get into the thick of the battle and head the "Green Resistance". Earn new bonuses and win trophies as you help the plants stop the beetles from taking revenge for their recent defeat in Garden Rescue: Christmas Edition![/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198013289375', 'num_games_owned': 3263, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 766, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 766, 'last_played': 1482599572}
review:
그냥 무난한 타워디펜스 게임입니다. 특징이라면 크리스마스 에디션이라는것...?
크리스마스 이브인데 올해도 혼자인게 외로워서...  크리스마스 기분좀 내보려고 해봤습니다.
그래픽은 깔끔하고 무난합니다. 해상도 지원이 좀 아쉽지만 넘어갈 수 있을정도.
브금이 캐롤편곡인데 꽤나 좋습니다. '도도도도도독' 하는 식물에서 미사일 나가는 효과음도 좋구요.
타워배치도 중요하지만 함정도 잘써야 하기 때문에 타워좀 지어놓고 멍때리는 류의 게임은 아닙니다.
아쉬운 점은 후반부 스테이지 하나하나가 끝장나게 길다는 것입니다. 아니 한 스테이지에서 웨이브가 25개...?
정신 딴데 팔다가 23웨이브에서 침입당해 별 2개 받으면 쬐끔 빡칩니다.
플레이타임은 브금 들으려고 켜놓기만 했던걸 빼면 대략 7시간 정도 입니다. (도전과제 완료 기준)

키워드 : 타워디펜스, 크리스마스, 번역기 한글화
총점 : 7.0 / 10

한글화가 번역기 수준입니다. 뜻을 이해하려 하지 마시고 그냥 식물 한 번 심어보고 효과를 보시는게 좋습니다.
도전과제 난이도는 꽤 쉬운 편입니다. 노말모드로 밀어버리세요.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985444246', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 12036, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 214, 'playtime_at_review': 4245, 'last_played': 1712451774}

author: {'steamid': '76561197975373553', 'num_games_owned': 1873, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 2154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2103, 'last_played': 1476827298}
review:
I play lots of TD, and I like hunting achievements to 100%.

Garden rescue is a good but not great tower defense. Without looking at the pricetag and can't remember how it got in my library I'd say its worth $5-$10 (but everyone's wallet is different). The levels are very nicely balanced on harder difficulties but failures can be rage inducing since rounds are slow and the differences between 2 and 3 stars earned is miniscule. 

Bad:
* No keyboard shortcuts. (Pfff. is this a PC-game or what?)
* The speed up button is not doing enough.
* Tower Upgrades/routes are lackluster at best. No meta-upgrades or meta-game at all.

Good:
* The powerup system works well, and it's almost a puzzle game more than anything else in how to use/abuse items so you can use your money on the "income-towers" as early as possible.
* Nothing is left up to chance. Every round is identical down to the last pixel. Often there some elements of chance in tower defense,  When you get that last monsters last 3 hp seemingly by luck just before it exits tower range? Here it can always be reproduced - and it's very satisfying to find "the perfect build" for the first few rounds. (Not that I think RNG is bad for TD's generally but the fixed numbers works very well for this game.)
* Very challenging (on hard and sometimes for 3 stars on normal). 
* I think the length of the game was just right as well - more and it would have gotten obnoxious.

Achievements however can all be taken on easiest setting, so no thrill there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007513026', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 433, 'playtime_forever': 1780, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 568, 'last_played': 1477113727}
review:
Simple and very fun TD game.

I've played most of the TD games on Steam and I won't claim that this is the best. But when you factor in the price it provides a lot of bang for the buck.

I also find it enjoyable to relax with a very simple game once and I while. Nothing complicated here just pure strategy. There are three difficulty levels (I play at the middle one and aim for three stars) so there should be a challange for most players.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971047607', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 135, 'last_played': 1473400140}
review:
A cute but difficult tower defense game with a christmas theme. It looks and feels like the mobile port it is. You don't place towers, you drag them into position. The maps are designed with a lot of micro-management involved, simply placing towers isn't enough, you may need to sell them to get money, which then allows you to place another tower elsewhere. You need to time the placement, upgrading, and selling of towers, with the amount of resources you have to ensure you have enough free resources to place the exact tower you need to beat/finish off that particular wave. (It's actually simpler than I'm making it sound here.)
What is tricky is the timing, which you only achieve through experience. Your defences might have held against the previous wave, but even just upgrading what you have might not beat the new one. You might have to sell some towers and/or exchange them with others depending on the wave.

Overall, I didn't particularly enjoy the micro-management and found it frustrating to get a long way into a level, only to lose because I messed up the timing or placement of a single tower. However, the graphics, sound, and gameplay were solid and it's very cheap. If you like micro-management and time management, then the game might appeal to you, but check out the gameplay on youtube first!

author: {'steamid': '76561197970602587', 'num_games_owned': 6364, 'num_reviews': 3660, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1476209458}
review:
https://youtu.be/QVGPFWBKG-k

Ah, just the sight of the ol' Christmas corn really gets the holiday spirit bubbling up inside.  Yet it's never that easy, our lot of trees are besieged by evil bugs who've declared war on Christmas in worse way than saying 'Happy Holidays' or less festive paper cups.

As a bland uninspired tower defense game that fails to properly tie in it's thin holiday reskin.  Random candy canes and hats don't make up for the poor mechanics and weak tower design.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019270397', 'num_games_owned': 4179, 'num_reviews': 733, 'playtime_forever': 1016, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1016, 'last_played': 1461188529}
review: Un petit jeu agréable et assez addictif malgré le manque d'originalité et un gameplay redondant. Mignon et reposant, pour tout public :) >> 13/20

author: {'steamid': '76561198070981577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 212, 'playtime_forever': 1135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1135, 'last_played': 1498208281}
review: "Garden Rescue: Christmas Edition" ist ein Tower Defense Spiel, das kurze Zeit nach dem ersten "Garden Rescue" erschienen ist. Beide Teile waren sehr gut spielbar und haben Spaß gemacht. Der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist moderat gehalten, so daß auch Jüngere Spaß an dem Spiel haben. Man muß die Weihnachtsbäume vor einer Heerschar Insekten beschützen, damit Weihnachten wie gewohnt stattfinden kann. Das Tutorial im Spiel ist sehr gut und es gibt zahlreiche Errungenschaften zu verdienen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087834803', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 629, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 538, 'last_played': 1590130438}
review:
It's Garden Rescue with Christmas graphics, new maps, a few new bonuses, and some minor UI improvements. I'm not sure if it's actually easier than Garden Rescue, or if I've just gotten better at playing. Overall I found it challenging on higher levels, but not frustrating.

It's a pretty basic tower defense game, so people with more experience in the genre might not enjoy it as much, but it's cute and fairly priced.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012545565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 242, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1456916927}
review:
Typical tower defense game (load of crap).

Around the 3rd or 4th map, the last wave had a single enemy with massive amounts of armor, that prevented it from receiving very much damage. Thus, it simply goes for a Sunday stroll right to the target and, instead of picking it up and going back through all of the towers again, it eats its target and you get defeated.


And if you do get past this part of the game, eventually you will get to a map that has no room for any more than 4 towers that when attacking, will be able to actually reach the target enemy. Upgrading them would help, howeveer you NEVER have enough money to actually do so. Also, you need twooers for ground and air, so that makes it two towers each, unless you try to use the tower that is supposed to hit land and air target, but again, you never have enough money to but this!

Game developers are totally clueless these days. Why bother making a game with difficulty levels, if the easy level is so hard that you lose casual players. You may as well just have hard mode and label it as such for HARD CORE PALYERS ONLY, that way the casual players will not waste time and more importantly money!

If you really must buy this crap, ensure you check out the youtube videos on how to complete the levels. Showing such tactics as selling towers to make money and room for different types of towers, only to sell these to go back to the original type of towers. If you have to resort to this type of tactic when playing in easy mode, then the game is just pathetic.

So, as for me, the developers can stick this stupid game up their rear end sideways!

DO NOT BUY!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197990162993', 'num_games_owned': 2834, 'num_reviews': 680, 'playtime_forever': 720, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 604, 'last_played': 1559040082}

author: {'steamid': '76561197963714403', 'num_games_owned': 10428, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1245, 'last_played': 1453570803}
review:
Prosty i przyjemny TD. Jedynie na poziomach gdzie nie możemy kupować obrony wymaga nieco więcej wysiłku.
13 osiągnięć z czego 12 z nich dostaniecie po prostu grając, jedynie uzyskanie perfekcyjnego wyniku we wszystkich poziomach może być trudniejsze. Grafika przyjmena dla oka, muzyka nieco słabiej wypada.

Mimo że polecam grę to raczej wyszukiwałbym jakiegoś kodu za poziom, bundla etc bo mimo wszystko na te 4e nie zasługuje.

[spoiler]Perfekcyjny wyniki można uzyskać na obojętnie jakim poziomie trudności.[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198050379221', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 2317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1944, 'last_played': 1453177849}
review:
More standard TD. Same game with different skin and a cactus tower. Fun for awhile. Borderline tedious but was just enjoyable enough to complete and get all the achievements. 

If you are playing on the hardest difficulty you will need to use your items strategically as well as manage your spending to get all three stars. I didn't bother trying the lesser difficulties after the second level.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037520882', 'num_games_owned': 695, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1452900657}
review:
A nice little tower defense game that you can get many hours out of. I was surprised that the hardest difficulty required multiple restarts. It was more challenging then I expected. 

You have a few towers to start with and unlock more as you win levels. Towers have 3 different upgrade levels and there are power ups that you can pick up from enemies which are crucial on high difficulties. Most of the money auto generates from the trees much like in Plants vs Zombies with the sunflowers. You can also pick up money from the occasional enemy.

It's simple, fun, and addictive, and feels a lot like Plants vs Zombies even though the mechanics are quite different. 

A great TD game to add to your collection. 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198133769938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1476629304}
review: Good gayme, reminds me of that one day in band camp where I was taken from behind and had to pay the nurse $100

author: {'steamid': '76561198031180632', 'num_games_owned': 593, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 523, 'last_played': 1452089391}
review:
Fast Alles ist so wie im ersten Teil, wieder einmal muß in 30 Leveln der Garten vor den Schädlingen gerettet werden, dabei kämpft man mit den bekannten Türmen gegen die bereits bekannten Gegner.
In jedem 6.ten Level kann man sich die Türme nicht aussuchen, sondern bekommt vorgefertigte Türme, die man platzieren muß und nicht upgraden kann. Zum Glück sind diese Level 6.ten Levels nun gelungener, als beim ersten Teil.
Die Entwickler haben ihr eigenes Spiel geclont, denn auch die Türme und Upgradestufen werden erst wieder im Verlauf des Spiels freigeschaltet.

[u]Der größte Unterschied zum Vorgänger[/u]
Es droppen nun 6(vorher 3) verschiedene Unterstützungsfähigkeiten mit denen man eingreifen kann.

Meine Review zum ersten Teil von Garden Rescue
http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198031180632/recommended/346210/

[u]Fazit[/u]
Im Garten gibt es nichts Neues, fast schon eine Frechheit einen Nachfolger mit so wenig Änderungen rauszubringen. Aber für sich alleine betrachtet ist es ein nettes kleines klassisches Tower Defense Spiel.
Wer den ersten Teil noch nicht gespielt hat, sollte bei einem Angebot eher zu dieser Christmas Edition greifen, da sie geringfügig besser ist.
Die bei einem Angebot bezahlten 1,99€ sind in Ordnung. 

Mehr Empfehlungen zu Tower Defense Spielen:
http://store.steampowered.com/curator/8896126-Gametests-and-Videos

author: {'steamid': '76561198050346843', 'num_games_owned': 1357, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 505, 'last_played': 1498505830}

author: {'steamid': '76561198069439929', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 235, 'playtime_forever': 565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1528332654}
review:
[h1][b]Gameplay[/b][/h1]
Solides Towerdefense Gameplay und es unterscheidet sich kaum von der ersten Version von Garden Rescue aber es gibt jetzt neue und doppelt soviele Levels. Die Achievments sind die gleichen. Man kann gut auf 100% der Achievments innerhalb von 7,5 Std kommen. Es gibt 3 Schwierigkeitsgrade und der schwerste ist durchaus sehr anspruchsvoll. Der Preis ist äuserst günstig, aber natürlich kriegt man hier kein High End Towerdefense Spiel was euch 30-50 Std beschäftigt, sondern eine Weihnachtsedition von Gardenrescue, welche mit etwas Weihnachtlicher Musik und Aufmachung der Gegner daherkommt. Es gibt auserdem ein paar neue Skills, aber sonst hat sich nichts geändert. Den key für das Spiel habe ich für Reviewzwecke erhalten aber das beeinflusst nicht meine Wertung.


[h1][b]Pro &. Kontra[/b][/h1]

[b]Pro[/b]
Sehr guter Preis und keine Bugs
Es kommt Weihnachtsstimmung auf
Diesmal ist die Musik weihnachtlicher
Steamachievments &. Ihr kriegt alle Achievements in ca. 7,5 Std.
Einsteigerfreundliches Tutorial
Auf Wunsch gibt es 3 Schwierigkeitsgrade wovon der letzte durchaus anspruchsvoll ist

[b]Kontra [/b]
Nur wenig neue Skills, und keine neuen Türme
Die Grafik ist eher solide.. ^.^
Leider etwas klein aber für den Preis absolut okay.
Wenige Türme


[h1][b]Fazit [/b][/h1]
Wer Weihnachtsstimmung mag, und Towerdefense gerne spielt, derjenige kann beruhigt zugreifen. Das Spiel hat auch zum Vollpreis ein gutes Preis Leistungsverhältniss

[b]Gesammtwertung 6.5/10[/b]


[i]Wenn euch diese Review gefallen hat, dann folgt unserem [url=store.steampowered.com/curator/8049466-German_Gamer_Community]Reviewprogramm[/url][/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198007759830', 'num_games_owned': 3051, 'num_reviews': 259, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1547395958}
review: Das Spiel ist ausser dem Design eigentlich fast das gleiche wie das normale Garden Resue. Viele der Grafiken wurden wieder verwendet, das Spielsystem ist identisch, nur 2-3 Winterliche Skills wurden hinzugefügt. Das Alleine würde das Spiel noch nichtmal aus dem renenn werfen, jedoch elider haben ein paar Spieler probleme mit dem Cache oder ähnlichem und die Admins sind seid anfang an Tot im Forum. Ihr könnt es gerne probieren aber falls ihr Probleme habt seid ihr leider auf euch selbst gestellt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027195149', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 652, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 652, 'last_played': 1447135785}
review: Pretty awesome game for the price. It does not have alot of depth but you can certainly find a challenge here. If you prefer a more casual game, you can always play on easy mode. For 4 dollars you cannot beat this.
